name: Pack Them All
description:
Description
A new type of puzzle game you've never played before! -
Help the scientist to pack his beloved robots for a long trip to Nowhere City.
Slide the tiny robot to fit the suitcase. Remember you can only make 3 cuts
Save and pack the robots with your friends

Features:
-New & attractive gameplay that will hook you for a long time
-91 challenging puzzling level to solve!
-Send the puzzle and ask friends for help!
-Intensive level to the very end!
-Intuitive, safe, and kid-friendly design
-Entertaining for kids and adults alike
